name: Sudharsan
desc: a full-stack engineer with a love for turning ideas into digital reality. From designing user-friendly interfaces to building robust backend solutions, I bring simplicity and creativity to the world of coding.
aboutme: Hello there! I'm Sudharsan, a first-year student at Anna University, majoring in Computer Science. My academic journey has allowed me to dive deep into Web-Development, and I'm incredibly passionate about leveraging technology to solve real-world problems. Being a student in today's dynamic digital era, I've had opportunities to work on exciting projects, some of which you can explore right here on my portfolio.
